remarks: Value of the value of the adjoint function.  (Contributed by NM, 22-Feb-2006.)  (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 10-Sep-2015.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
adjvalval $p |- ( ( T e. dom adjh /\ A e. ~H ) -> ( ( adjh ` T ) ` A ) = ( iota_ w e. ~H A. x e. ~H ( ( T ` x ) .ih A ) = ( x .ih w ) ) ) $.
$d A w x $.
$d T w x $.
$d w x $.
$d w x $.
